title: Stag Sans Book or Neutra No. 2 Text Book as body copy in book?
content:
hey all,

tomorrow (sat) i am putting together a book, and was thinking of using a sans for the body copy.

my work has stag sans book and neutra no.2 text book and i was thinking of using one of these, what are your thoughts?

i'm just finishing another book in which i've used arno pro, which has been great, arno is a great typeface.

i look forward to hearing your thoughts.

cheers - sye :)
author: Simon Robertson
